mapper.select: SELECT id, recruit_id AS recruitId, name, grade, major, message, file_name AS fileName, file_path AS filePath, created_at AS createdAt FROM application WHERE recruit_id = #{recruitId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, recruit_id AS recruitId, name, grade, major, message, file_name AS fileName, file_path AS filePath, created_at AS createdAt FROM application WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO application (recruit_id, name, grade, major, message, file_name, file_path) VALUES (#{recruitId}, #{name}, #{grade}, #{major}, #{message}, #{fileName}, #{filePath})
mapper.update: UPDATE application SET name = #{name}, grade = #{grade}, major = #{major}, message = #{message}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_path = #{filePath} WHERE id = #{id}
